long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
OUI9 HLS Player M3U8

The OUI9 HLS Player M3U8 is a versatile Chrome extension designed to enhance your online video streaming experience. This extension provides seamless playback of HLS (HTTP Live Streaming) and DASH (Dynamic Adaptive Streaming over HTTP) streams directly in your browser.

Key Features:

Seamless HLS and DASH Playback: Enjoy smooth streaming of HLS and DASH videos with the integrated Clappr player.
Custom Header Support: Automatically modifies HTTP headers (User-Agent, Referer, and Origin) for video URLs containing specific parameters. This feature ensures compatibility and access to streams that require custom headers.
Chromecast Support: Cast your videos to a Chromecast-enabled device with ease.
Picture-in-Picture Mode: Continue watching your videos in a small floating window while multitasking in other tabs or applications.
Adaptive Streaming: Supports adaptive streaming technologies to provide the best quality playback based on your network conditions.
Widevine DRM Support: Securely stream protected content with Widevine DRM.
How It Works:

Automatic Header Modification: When a video URL containing the parameter ?header or originating from the extension itself (chrome-extension://) is detected, the extension automatically decodes and applies the necessary HTTP headers for seamless playback.
Enhanced Playback Controls: The extension integrates advanced playback controls, including seeking, fullscreen mode, and customizable media controls.
Dynamic Rules Management: The extension dynamically adjusts its behavior based on the URLs being accessed, ensuring that header modifications are applied only when necessary.
Usage:

To use the OUI9 HLS Player M3U8, simply open a video URL containing the ?header parameter or use the extension's dedicated player page. The extension will handle the rest, ensuring that the required HTTP headers are applied for a smooth streaming experience.
We use Clappr Player 100% open source
- http://clappr.io/
- https://github.com/clappr/clappr
